channel.title: Making yourself admin
channel.description:
Hi, Im stupid but how do you change yourself into an admin. Im currently using owaged scape source.
Ive also got another question how do you change your levels and so forth.
Thank you jimm

item.title: Making yourself admin
item.dc:creator: @waterslicer waterslicer
item.description:
@waterslicer wrote:

how do i make myself owner tho

Read full topic

item.title: Making yourself admin
item.dc:creator: @Itachi_Uchiha Itachi Uchiha
item.description:
@Itachi_Uchiha wrote:

[quote=“usernamelol, post:3, topic:16101”][quote author=Itachi Uchiha link=topic=24070.msg270499#msg270499 date=1159150418]
go into characters and click your name where it says player rights change that to a 3
for levels just go to skills and change every level to 99 and every skill to 14000000
[/quote]
Or…Go into client.java search for playerRights = 2; And put your name in the blank or where sosmeone else has their name. For skills search for addxp and put your name where says someones name or where it is blank.

Make sure you have addxp command then in game type ::addxp (skills # here) (xp here)[/quote]yeah for some servers, for others use mine

Read full topic

item.title: Making yourself admin
item.dc:creator: @usernamelol .Fusion
item.description:
@usernamelol wrote:

[quote=“Itachi Uchiha, post:2, topic:16101”]go into characters and click your name where it says player rights change that to a 3
for levels just go to skills and change every level to 99 and every skill to 14000000[/quote]
Or…Go into client.java search for playerRights = 2; And put your name in the blank or where sosmeone else has their name. For skills search for addxp and put your name where says someones name or where it is blank.

Make sure you have addxp command then in game type ::addxp (skills # here) (xp here)

Read full topic
